Plot: Sandy Ricks is sent by his mom to Coral Key, a rustic island in the Florida keys, to spend the summer with his uncle Porter Ricks. Sandy dislikes everything about his new environment until ...
Title: Flipper
Writer: Ricou Browning (story), Jack Cowden (story), Arthur Weiss (earlier screenplay), Alan Shapiro (screenplay)
Actors: Elijah Wood, Paul Hogan, Jonathan Banks, Robert Deacon
